name: If you love me go to hell
name_original: If you love me go to hell
description:
Play as Beel and descend into HELL after obtaining a letter from his not so long lost girlfriend, Luci. The letter simply stating:   "If you love me go to hell" Design Team
  • Peerawich Sinamornwech
    • Director
    • Producer
  • Siwagon Seekhun
    • Design
  • Tee Rungsrithong
    • Design

    • Art Director
  • Burapol Sanguanpak
    • Animator
  • Chanunpat Kositphantawong
    • Animator
Code Team
  • Tanaphat Vivattanakijcharoen
    • Lead Programmer
  • Poonyawat Pornamnueysub
    • Programmer

Music by Keoface

Deep Lore
  • Beel is a high ranking angel from heaven.
  • Luci is actually the demon lord of hell.
  • They met each other at a ****bucks.
  • Luci was removed from the game due to the project's scope issue.
    • a Luci boss fight was planned.
  • Beel was depressed for a while after Luci disappeared.
  • Activities during Luci's disappearance:
    • Cry.
    • Go to sleep.
  • Luci's hair is not actually naturally white, she dyed it.

Warning: Game is likely to caused memory leak, please restart computer after playing the game. Our Code Team made the engine themselves, it is so cool.
